alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Rooks (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 2:00PM CDT until June 05 at 2:45PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hastings has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Rooks County in north central Kansas... Phillips County in north central Kansas... * Until 245 PM CDT. * At 200 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Speed, or 10 miles southwest of Phillipsburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Glade around 220 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Kirwin. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
